Verses.30: "The God of our ancestors raised up Jesus, whom you killed by hanging Him on a Cross.
Verses.31: He is the one exalted to the right hand of God as a Prince and Savior. To deliver repentance to Israel and the forgiveness of sins.
Verses.32: And we are witnesses to all of this, along with the Holy Spirit, whom God has given to those who obey Him."

Changes: 2022-06-04 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 30-32 based on Greek.
